question.en: Who was the first person to recite the Quran openly in Mecca?
question.tr: Mekke'de Kuran'ı açıktan ilk okuyan sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah orang pertama yang membaca Al-Quran secara terbuka di Mekah?
question.ms: Siapakah orang pertama yang membaca Al-Quran secara terbuka di Mekah?

question.en: Which Companion is mentioned by name in the Quran?
question.tr: Kuran-ı Kerim'de ismiyle zikredilen tek Sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Sahabat mana yang namanya disebutkan dalam Al-Quran?
question.ms: Sahabat mana yang namanya disebut dalam Al-Quran?

question.en: What was the name of the Prophet's (SAW) she-camel during the Hijrah?
question.tr: Hicret sırasında Peygamber Efendimiz'in (SAV) devesinin adı neydi?
question.id: Apa nama unta Nabi (SAW) saat Hijrah?
question.ms: Apakah nama unta Nabi (SAW) semasa Hijrah?

question.en: Who is known as the 'Trustee (Amin) of this Ummah'?
question.tr: Bu ümmetin 'Emini' (Güveniliri) olarak bilinen sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah yang dikenal sebagai 'Al-Amin' (Kepercayaan) umat ini?
question.ms: Siapakah yang dikenali sebagai 'Al-Amin' (Kepercayaan) umat ini?

question.en: Which Surah contains two Bismillahs?
question.tr: İçinde iki tane Besmele bulunan sure hangisidir?
question.id: Surah mana yang mengandung dua Bismillah?
question.ms: Surah mana yang mengandungi dua Bismillah?

question.en: In which year of Hijrah was Fasting in Ramadan made obligatory?
question.tr: Ramazan orucu Hicretin kaçıncı yılında farz kılınmıştır?
question.id: Pada tahun Hijriah ke berapa puasa Ramadan diwajibkan?
question.ms: Pada tahun Hijrah ke berapa puasa Ramadan diwajibkan?

question.en: Who was the first martyr (Shahid) in Islam?
question.tr: İslam'ın ilk şehidi kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah syahid (martir) pertama dalam Islam?
question.ms: Siapakah syahid pertama dalam Islam?

question.en: Which Prophet is known as 'Kalimullah' (The one who spoke to Allah)?
question.tr: 'Kelîmullah' (Allah ile konuşan) olarak bilinen peygamber kimdir?
question.id: Nabi mana yang dikenal sebagai 'Kalimullah' (Yang berbicara dengan Allah)?
question.ms: Nabi mana yang dikenali sebagai 'Kalimullah' (Yang berbicara dengan Allah)?

question.en: What is the name of the angels who question the dead in the grave?
question.tr: Kabirde ölüleri sorgulayan meleklerin isimleri nelerdir?
question.id: Apa nama malaikat yang menanyai orang mati di dalam kubur?
question.ms: Apakah nama malaikat yang menyoal orang mati di dalam kubur?

question.en: Which Surah does not start with the Basmala?
question.tr: Besmele ile başlamayan tek sure hangisidir?
question.id: Surah mana yang tidak diawali dengan Basmalah?
question.ms: Surah mana yang tidak dimulai dengan Basmalah?

question.en: Who was the cousin of Khadija (R.A.) who confirmed the Prophet's prophethood?
question.tr: Hz. Hatice'nin (R.A.) kuzeni olan ve Peygamberliği ilk doğrulayan kişi kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah sepupu Khadijah (R.A.) yang membenarkan kenabian Nabi?
question.ms: Siapakah sepupu Khadijah (R.A.) yang mengesahkan kenabian Nabi?

question.en: Who was known as the 'Keeper of the Secret' of the Prophet (SAW)?
question.tr: Peygamber Efendimiz'in (SAV) 'Sırdaşı' olarak bilinen sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah yang dikenal sebagai 'Pemegang Rahasia' Nabi (SAW)?
question.ms: Siapakah yang dikenali sebagai 'Pemegang Rahsia' Nabi (SAW)?

question.en: Which Prophet is mentioned the most times in the Quran?
question.tr: Kuran-ı Kerim'de ismi en çok geçen peygamber kimdir?
question.id: Nabi mana yang paling banyak disebutkan dalam Al-Quran?
question.ms: Nabi mana yang paling banyak disebut dalam Al-Quran?

question.en: Who was the first child born to the Muhajirun (Emigrants) in Medina?
question.tr: Medine'de Muhacirlerden doğan ilk çocuk kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah anak pertama yang lahir dari kalangan Muhajirin di Madinah?
question.ms: Siapakah anak pertama yang lahir daripada kalangan Muhajirin di Madinah?

question.en: What is the name of the Angel in charge of Hellfire (Jahannam)?
question.tr: Cehennemin bekçisi olan meleğin adı nedir?
question.id: Apa nama malaikat penjaga Neraka (Jahannam)?
question.ms: Apakah nama malaikat penjaga Neraka (Jahannam)?

question.en: Which battle took place in the month of Ramadan?
question.tr: Ramazan ayında gerçekleşen büyük savaş hangisidir?
question.id: Perang mana yang terjadi pada bulan Ramadan?
question.ms: Peperangan mana yang berlaku pada bulan Ramadan?

question.en: Who was the first ambassador of Islam sent to Medina before Hijrah?
question.tr: Hicretten önce Medine'ye gönderilen İslam'ın ilk öğretmeni (elçisi) kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah duta Islam pertama yang dikirim ke Madinah sebelum Hijrah?
question.ms: Siapakah duta Islam pertama yang dihantar ke Madinah sebelum Hijrah?

question.en: Which Sahabi was known as 'Dhul-Nurayn' (Possessor of Two Lights)?
question.tr: 'Zinnureyn' (İki Nur Sahibi) lakaplı sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Sahabat mana yang dikenal sebagai 'Dzun Nurain' (Pemilik Dua Cahaya)?
question.ms: Sahabat mana yang dikenali sebagai 'Dzun Nurain' (Pemilik Dua Cahaya)?

question.en: Which wife of the Prophet (SAW) was the daughter of Abu Bakr (R.A.)?
question.tr: Hz. Ebubekir'in (R.A.) kızı olan Peygamber eşi kimdir?
question.id: Istri Nabi (SAW) mana yang merupakan putri Abu Bakar (R.A.)?
question.ms: Isteri Nabi (SAW) mana yang merupakan anak perempuan Abu Bakar (R.A.)?

question.en: What is the name of the prayer performed for rain?
question.tr: Yağmur yağması için kılınan namazın adı nedir?
question.id: Apa nama salat yang dilakukan untuk meminta hujan?
question.ms: Apakah nama solat yang dilakukan untuk meminta hujan?

question.en: Which Sahabi was washed by the Angels when he was martyred?
question.tr: Şehit edildiğinde melekler tarafından yıkanan sahabe (Gasilü'l-Melaike) kimdir?
question.id: Sahabat mana yang dimandikan oleh malaikat ketika ia syahid?
question.ms: Sahabat mana yang dimandikan oleh malaikat ketika beliau syahid?

question.en: Who is known as 'Dhun-Nun' (The Man of the Whale) in the Quran?
question.tr: Kuran'da 'Zünnun' (Balık Sahibi) olarak anılan peygamber kimdir?
question.id: Siapa yang dikenal sebagai 'Dzun Nun' (Pemilik Ikan) dalam Al-Quran?
question.ms: Siapa yang dikenali sebagai 'Dzun Nun' (Pemilik Ikan) dalam Al-Quran?

question.en: Which Surah is equivalent to one-third of the Quran?
question.tr: Kuran-ı Kerim'in üçte birine denk olduğu belirtilen sure hangisidir?
question.id: Surah mana yang setara dengan sepertiga Al-Quran?
question.ms: Surah mana yang bersamaan dengan satu pertiga Al-Quran?

question.en: Who was the first person to shoot an arrow for the sake of Islam?
question.tr: İslam uğruna ilk ok atan sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah orang pertama yang melepaskan anak panah di jalan Allah?
question.ms: Siapakah orang pertama yang melepaskan anak panah di jalan Allah?

question.en: What was the first Mosque built by the Prophet (SAW)?
question.tr: Peygamber Efendimiz (SAV) tarafından inşa edilen ilk mescit hangisidir?
question.id: Apa masjid pertama yang dibangun oleh Nabi (SAW)?
question.ms: Apakah masjid pertama yang dibina oleh Nabi (SAW)?

question.en: Who led the Muslim army in the conquest of Egypt?
question.tr: Mısır'ın fethinde İslam ordusuna komutanlık eden sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah yang memimpin tentara Muslim dalam penaklukan Mesir?
question.ms: Siapakah yang memimpin tentera Islam dalam pembukaan Mesir?

question.en: Which Companion was known as the 'Interpreter of the Quran' (Turjuman al-Quran)?
question.tr: 'Kuran'ın Tercümanı' (Tercüman-ül Kuran) olarak bilinen sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Sahabat mana yang dikenal sebagai 'Penerjemah Al-Quran' (Turjumanul Quran)?
question.ms: Sahabat mana yang dikenali sebagai 'Penterjemah Al-Quran' (Turjumanul Quran)?

question.en: How many years did the revelation of the Quran take?
question.tr: Kuran-ı Kerim'in indirilmesi kaç yıl sürmüştür?
question.id: Berapa lama waktu yang dibutuhkan untuk turunnya Al-Quran?
question.ms: Berapa lama masa yang diambil untuk penurunan Al-Quran?

question.en: Who claimed false prophethood during the time of Abu Bakr (R.A.)?
question.tr: Hz. Ebubekir döneminde peygamberlik iddiasında bulunan yalancı kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah yang mengaku sebagai nabi palsu pada masa Abu Bakar (R.A.)?
question.ms: Siapakah yang mendakwa sebagai nabi palsu pada zaman Abu Bakar (R.A.)?

question.en: Which Angel is tasked with blowing the Trumpet (Sur) on Judgement Day?
question.tr: Kıyamet günü Sur'a üflemekle görevli melek hangisidir?
question.id: Malaikat mana yang bertugas meniup sangkakala (Sur) pada Hari Kiamat?
question.ms: Malaikat mana yang bertugas meniup sangkakala (Sur) pada Hari Kiamat?

question.en: Which Companion was given the title 'Saifullah' (Sword of Allah)?
question.tr: 'Seyfullah' (Allah'ın Kılıcı) lakabı verilen sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Sahabat mana yang diberi gelar 'Saifullah' (Pedang Allah)?
question.ms: Sahabat mana yang diberi gelaran 'Saifullah' (Pedang Allah)?

question.en: What is the name of the treaty signed between Muslims and Quraysh in 6 AH?
question.tr: Hicretin 6. yılında Müslümanlar ve Kureyş arasında imzalanan antlaşma nedir?
question.id: Apa nama perjanjian yang ditandatangani antara kaum Muslimin dan Quraisy pada tahun 6 H?
question.ms: Apakah nama perjanjian yang ditandatangani antara umat Islam dan Quraisy pada tahun 6 H?

question.en: Who was the wet nurse of Prophet Muhammad (SAW)?
question.tr: Peygamber Efendimiz'in (SAV) süt annesi kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah ibu susu Nabi Muhammad (SAW)?
question.ms: Siapakah ibu susu Nabi Muhammad (SAW)?

question.en: Which Surah is known as 'The Mother of the Book' (Umm al-Kitab)?
question.tr: 'Kitabın Anası' (Ümmül Kitap) olarak bilinen sure hangisidir?
question.id: Surah mana yang dikenal sebagai 'Induk Kitab' (Ummul Kitab)?
question.ms: Surah mana yang dikenali sebagai 'Ibu Kitab' (Ummul Kitab)?

question.en: In which battle did the Prophet's uncle Hamza (R.A.) become a martyr?
question.tr: Peygamberimiz'in amcası Hz. Hamza (R.A.) hangi savaşta şehit düşmüştür?
question.id: Dalam perang apa paman Nabi, Hamzah (R.A.) gugur sebagai syahid?
question.ms: Dalam peperangan mana bapa saudara Nabi, Hamzah (R.A.) gugur sebagai syahid?

question.en: Which Prophet could control the wind and talk to animals?
question.tr: Rüzgara hükmedebilen ve hayvanlarla konuşabilen peygamber kimdir?
question.id: Nabi mana yang dapat mengendalikan angin dan berbicara dengan hewan?
question.ms: Nabi mana yang boleh menguasai angin dan bercakap dengan haiwan?

question.en: What is the limit of gold (Nisab) for Zakat to become obligatory?
question.tr: Zekatın farz olması için gereken altın nisap miktarı nedir?
question.id: Berapa batas emas (Nisab) agar zakat menjadi wajib?
question.ms: Berapakah had emas (Nisab) untuk zakat menjadi wajib?

question.en: Who was the last of the Prophets sent to the Children of Israel before Muhammad (SAW)?
question.tr: Hz. Muhammed'den (SAV) önce İsrailoğullarına gönderilen son peygamber kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah nabi terakhir yang diutus kepada Bani Israil sebelum Muhammad (SAW)?
question.ms: Siapakah nabi terakhir yang diutus kepada Bani Israil sebelum Muhammad (SAW)?

question.en: Which companion collected the Quran into a single volume during Abu Bakr's caliphate?
question.tr: Hz. Ebubekir döneminde Kuran'ı kitap haline getiren heyetin başındaki sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Sahabat mana yang mengumpulkan Al-Quran menjadi satu mushaf pada masa kekhalifahan Abu Bakar?
question.ms: Sahabat mana yang mengumpulkan Al-Quran menjadi satu mushaf pada zaman pemerintahan Abu Bakar?

question.en: What is the name of the fountain promised to the Prophet (SAW) in Paradise?
question.tr: Cennette Peygamber Efendimiz'e (SAV) vaat edilen havuzun adı nedir?
question.id: Apa nama telaga yang dijanjikan kepada Nabi (SAW) di surga?
question.ms: Apakah nama telaga yang dijanjikan kepada Nabi (SAW) di syurga?

question.en: How many gates does Jannah (Paradise) have?
question.tr: Cennetin kaç kapısı vardır?
question.id: Berapa banyak pintu yang dimiliki surga (Jannah)?
question.ms: Berapa banyak pintu yang ada di syurga (Jannah)?

question.en: Which wife of the Prophet (SAW) narrated the most Hadith?
question.tr: En çok hadis rivayet eden Peygamber eşi kimdir?
question.id: Istri Nabi (SAW) mana yang meriwayatkan hadis paling banyak?
question.ms: Isteri Nabi (SAW) mana yang meriwayatkan hadis paling banyak?

question.en: What is the act of running between Safa and Marwa called?
question.tr: Safa ve Merve tepeleri arasında gidip gelme ibadetine ne denir?
question.id: Apa sebutan untuk ibadah berlari kecil antara Safa dan Marwa?
question.ms: Apakah nama ibadah berlari-lari kecil antara Safa dan Marwa?

question.en: Who was the first child to accept Islam?
question.tr: İslam'ı kabul eden ilk çocuk kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah anak pertama yang menerima Islam?
question.ms: Siapakah kanak-kanak pertama yang menerima Islam?

question.en: Which Prophet was thrown into a fire by King Nimrud but remained unburned?
question.tr: Kral Nemrut tarafından ateşe atılan fakat yanmayan peygamber kimdir?
question.id: Nabi mana yang dilemparkan ke dalam api oleh Raja Namrud tetapi tidak terbakar?
question.ms: Nabi mana yang dilemparkan ke dalam api oleh Raja Namrud tetapi tidak terbakar?

question.en: In which city did Imam Bukhari collect his Sahih Hadith?
question.tr: İmam Buhari Sahih hadis kitabını ağırlıklı olarak hangi şehirde derledi?
question.id: Di kota mana Imam Bukhari menyusun kitab Sahih-nya?
question.ms: Di bandar mana Imam Bukhari menyusun kitab Sahih-nya?

question.en: Which Surah contains two prostrations (Sujud of Tilawah)?
question.tr: İçinde iki tane tilavet secdesi bulunan sure hangisidir?
question.id: Surah mana yang mengandung dua sujud tilawah?
question.ms: Surah mana yang mengandungi dua sujud tilawah?

question.en: Who are the 'Kiraman Katibin'?
question.tr: 'Kiramen Katibin' kimlerdir?
question.id: Siapakah 'Kiraman Katibin'?
question.ms: Siapakah 'Kiraman Katibin'?

question.en: Which uncle of the Prophet (SAW) protected him but died without accepting Islam?
question.tr: Peygamberi koruyan ancak Müslüman olmadan vefat eden amcası kimdir?
question.id: Paman Nabi (SAW) mana yang melindunginya tetapi wafat tanpa menerima Islam?
question.ms: Bapa saudara Nabi (SAW) mana yang melindungi baginda tetapi meninggal tanpa menerima Islam?

question.id: Apa nama pembatas antara kehidupan dunia dan akhirat?
question.ms: Apakah nama sempadan antara kehidupan dunia dan akhirat?

question.en: Which Prophet was tested with severe illness and patience?
question.tr: Şiddetli hastalık ve sabır ile imtihan edilen peygamber kimdir?
question.id: Nabi mana yang diuji dengan penyakit berat dan kesabaran?
question.ms: Nabi mana yang diuji dengan penyakit berat dan kesabaran?

question.en: How many verses (Ayat) are in Surah Al-Kawthar?
question.tr: Kevser Suresi kaç ayettir?
question.id: Berapa jumlah ayat dalam Surah Al-Kautsar?
question.ms: Berapa jumlah ayat dalam Surah Al-Kautsar?

question.en: Which Prophet was a carpenter by trade?
question.tr: Mesleği marangozluk olan peygamber kimdir?
question.id: Nabi mana yang berprofesi sebagai tukang kayu?
question.ms: Nabi mana yang bekerja sebagai tukang kayu?

question.en: What year is known as the 'Year of Sorrow' (Aam al-Huzn)?
question.tr: 'Hüzün Yılı' olarak bilinen yıl hangi olaylarla anılır?
question.id: Tahun apa yang dikenal sebagai 'Tahun Kesedihan' (Amul Huzn)?
question.ms: Tahun apa yang dikenali sebagai 'Tahun Kesedihan' (Amul Huzn)?

answer.en: The year Khadija (R.A.) and Abu Talib died
answer.tr: Hz. Hatice ve Ebu Talib'in vefat ettiği yıl
answer.id: Tahun wafatnya Khadijah (R.A.) dan Abu Thalib
answer.ms: Tahun kewafatan Khadijah (R.A.) dan Abu Talib

question.en: Which Surah protects against the Dajjal (Anti-Christ) if the first 10 verses are memorized?
question.tr: İlk 10 ayeti ezberlendiğinde Deccal'in fitnesinden koruyan sure hangisidir?
question.id: Surah mana yang melindungi dari Dajjal jika 10 ayat pertamanya dihafal?
question.ms: Surah mana yang melindungi daripada Dajjal jika 10 ayat pertamanya dihafal?

question.tr: Yalancı peygamber Müseylime'yi kim öldürmüştür?
question.id: Siapakah yang membunuh nabi palsu Musailamah?
question.ms: Siapakah yang membunuh nabi palsu Musailamah?

question.en: What was the first Qibla of Islam before Mecca?
question.tr: Müslümanların Mekke'den önceki ilk kıblesi neresidir?
question.id: Apa kiblat pertama umat Islam sebelum Mekah?
question.ms: Apakah kiblat pertama umat Islam sebelum Mekah?

question.en: Which Prophet was given the Psalms (Zabur)?
question.tr: Zebur'un indirildiği peygamber kimdir?
question.id: Nabi mana yang diberikan kitab Zabur?
question.ms: Nabi mana yang diberikan kitab Zabur?

question.tr: İslam'ı kabul eden Habeşistan Kralı'nın (Necaşi) adı nedir?
question.id: Apa nama Raja Habasyah (Najasyi) yang menerima Islam?
question.ms: Apakah nama Raja Habsyah (Najasyi) yang menerima Islam?

question.tr: Peygamber Efendimiz (SAV) hangi kabileye mensuptu?
question.id: Nabi Muhammad (SAW) berasal dari suku apa?
question.ms: Nabi Muhammad (SAW) berasal daripada suku mana?

question.en: What is the name of the gate in Jannah reserved for those who fast?
question.tr: Cennette sadece oruç tutanların gireceği kapının adı nedir?
question.id: Apa nama pintu di surga yang dikhususkan bagi orang yang berpuasa?
question.ms: Apakah nama pintu di syurga yang dikhaskan bagi orang yang berpuasa?

question.en: Who is the 'Pharaoh of this Ummah' according to the Prophet (SAW)?
question.tr: Peygamber Efendimiz'in (SAV) 'Bu ümmetin Firavunu' dediği kişi kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah 'Fir'aun umat ini' menurut Nabi (SAW)?
question.ms: Siapakah 'Firaun umat ini' menurut Nabi (SAW)?

question.en: Which prayer is performed at the time of a solar eclipse?
question.tr: Güneş tutulması sırasında kılınan namaz hangisidir?
question.id: Salat apa yang dilaksanakan saat terjadi gerhana matahari?
question.ms: Solat apa yang dilaksanakan ketika berlaku gerhana matahari?

question.en: What is the literal meaning of the word 'Islam'?
question.tr: 'İslam' kelimesinin kelime anlamı nedir?
question.id: Apa arti harfiah dari kata 'Islam'?
question.ms: Apakah makna literal perkataan 'Islam'?

question.en: Who led the Migration to Abyssinia?
question.tr: Habeşistan'a yapılan hicrete kim liderlik etmiştir?
question.id: Siapakah yang memimpin Hijrah ke Habasyah?
question.ms: Siapakah yang memimpin Hijrah ke Habsyah?

question.en: How many Prophets are mentioned by name in the Quran?
question.tr: Kuran-ı Kerim'de kaç peygamberin ismi geçer?
question.id: Berapa banyak nabi yang disebutkan namanya dalam Al-Quran?
question.ms: Berapa banyak nabi yang disebut namanya dalam Al-Quran?

question.en: Which Companion was known as the 'Roman' despite being Arab, due to his upbringing?
question.tr: Aslen Arap olmasına rağmen Bizans topraklarında büyüdüğü için 'Rumi' lakabını alan sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Sahabat mana yang dikenal sebagai 'Romawi' meskipun berdarah Arab, karena dibesarkan di sana?
question.ms: Sahabat mana yang dikenali sebagai 'Romawi' walaupun berbangsa Arab, kerana dibesarkan di sana?

question.en: What was the real name of Abu Bakr (R.A.)?
question.tr: Hz. Ebubekir'in (R.A.) gerçek ismi nedir?
question.id: Apa nama asli Abu Bakar (R.A.)?
question.ms: Apakah nama sebenar Abu Bakar (R.A.)?

question.tr: 'Halilullah' (Allah'ın Dostu) unvanına sahip peygamber kimdir?
question.id: Nabi mana yang dikenal sebagai 'Khalilullah' (Kekasih Allah)?
question.ms: Nabi mana yang dikenali sebagai 'Khalilullah' (Kekasih Allah)?

question.tr: 70 Hafızın şehit edildiği (ve Kuran'ın kitaplaştırılmasını hızlandıran) savaş hangisidir?
question.id: Dalam perang mana 70 orang penghafal Al-Quran gugur sebagai syahid?
question.ms: Dalam peperangan mana 70 orang penghafal Al-Quran gugur sebagai syahid?

question.en: What is the name of the Prophet's (SAW) sword?
question.tr: Peygamber Efendimiz'in (SAV) meşhur kılıcının adı nedir?
question.id: Apa nama pedang Nabi (SAW)?
question.ms: Apakah nama pedang Nabi (SAW)?

question.en: Which Surah is known as 'The Beauty of the Quran' (Arus al-Quran)?
question.tr: 'Kuran'ın Gelini' veya Süsü olarak bilinen sure hangisidir?
question.id: Surah mana yang dikenal sebagai 'Pengantin Al-Quran' (Arusul Quran)?
question.ms: Surah mana yang dikenali sebagai 'Pengantin Al-Quran' (Arusul Quran)?

question.en: Who killed the false prophet Musaylamah?
question.tr: Yalancı Peygamber Müseylime'yi kim öldürmüştür?
question.id: Siapakah yang membunuh nabi palsu Musailamah?
question.ms: Siapakah yang membunuh nabi palsu Musailamah?

question.en: Who was the governor of Yemen appointed by the Prophet (SAW)?
question.tr: Peygamber Efendimiz (SAV) tarafından Yemen'e vali olarak gönderilen sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah gubernur Yaman yang ditunjuk oleh Nabi (SAW)?
question.ms: Siapakah gabenor Yaman yang dilantik oleh Nabi (SAW)?

question.en: Which Surah in the Quran mentions the name of 'Allah' in every single verse?
question.tr: Her ayetinde 'Allah' lafzı geçen sure hangisidir?
question.id: Surah mana dalam Al-Quran yang menyebutkan nama 'Allah' di setiap ayatnya?
question.ms: Surah mana dalam Al-Quran yang menyebut nama 'Allah' di setiap ayatnya?

question.en: Who was the only woman to be named in the Quran?
question.tr: Kuran-ı Kerim'de ismi geçen tek kadın kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah satu-satunya wanita yang disebutkan namanya dalam Al-Quran?
question.ms: Siapakah satu-satunya wanita yang disebut namanya dalam Al-Quran?

question.en: Who was the leader of the Hypocrites (Munafiqun) in Medina?
question.tr: Medine'deki Münafıkların lideri kimdi?
question.id: Siapakah pemimpin kaum Munafik di Madinah?
question.ms: Siapakah pemimpin golongan Munafik di Madinah?

question.en: Which pillar of Islam was ordained directly in the Heavens during Mi'raj?
question.tr: Miraç hadisesinde doğrudan göklerde farz kılınan ibadet hangisidir?
question.id: Rukun Islam mana yang diwajibkan langsung di langit saat Mi'raj?
question.ms: Rukun Islam mana yang diwajibkan terus di langit semasa Mikraj?

question.en: Who are the 'Ashara Mubashara'?
question.tr: 'Aşere-i Mübeşşere' kime denir?
question.id: Siapakah 'Asyarah Mubasysyarah'?
question.ms: Siapakah 'Asyarah Mubasysyarah'?

question.en: What was the duration of the Treaty of Hudaybiyyah supposed to be?
question.tr: Hudeybiye Antlaşması'nın süresi kaç yıl olarak belirlenmişti?
question.id: Berapa lama durasi Perjanjian Hudaibiyah seharusnya berlaku?
question.ms: Berapa lama tempoh Perjanjian Hudaibiyah sepatutnya berkuat kuasa?

question.en: Who was the mother of Prophet Ismail (A.S.)?
question.tr: Hz. İsmail'in (A.S.) annesi kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah ibu Nabi Ismail (A.S.)?
question.ms: Siapakah ibu Nabi Ismail (A.S.)?

question.en: Which mosque has two Qiblas (Masjid al-Qiblatayn)?
question.tr: İki Kıbleli Mescit (Mescid-i Kıbleteyn) hangi şehirdedir?
question.id: Masjid mana yang memiliki dua kiblat (Masjid al-Qiblatain)?
question.ms: Masjid mana yang mempunyai dua kiblat (Masjid al-Qiblatain)?

question.en: Who killed the fierce warrior Amr ibn Abd Wud in the Battle of the Trench?
question.tr: Hendek Savaşı'nda ünlü savaşçı Amr bin Abd Vud'u kim öldürmüştür?
question.id: Siapakah yang membunuh pejuang tangguh Amr bin Abd Wud dalam Perang Khandaq?
question.ms: Siapakah yang membunuh pejuang hebat Amr bin Abd Wud dalam Perang Khandak?

question.en: Which Prophet was raised to the heavens and will return?
question.tr: Göğe yükseltilen ve kıyamete yakın tekrar yeryüzüne inecek olan peygamber kimdir?
question.id: Nabi mana yang diangkat ke langit dan akan kembali?
question.ms: Nabi mana yang diangkat ke langit dan akan kembali?

question.en: What was the name of the pledge taken under the tree mentioned in the Quran?
question.tr: Kuran'da bahsedilen, ağaç altında yapılan yeminin adı nedir?
question.id: Apa nama baiat yang dilakukan di bawah pohon yang disebutkan dalam Al-Quran?
question.ms: Apakah nama baiah yang dilakukan di bawah pokok yang disebut dalam Al-Quran?

question.en: Which wife of the Prophet (SAW) was of Jewish descent?
question.tr: Peygamber Efendimiz'in (SAV) Yahudi kökenli eşi kimdir?
question.id: Istri Nabi (SAW) mana yang berasal dari keturunan Yahudi?
question.ms: Isteri Nabi (SAW) mana yang berasal daripada keturunan Yahudi?

question.en: What is the tree in Hell called that sinners will eat from?
question.tr: Cehennemde günahkarların yiyeceği o korkunç ağacın adı nedir?
question.id: Apa nama pohon di Neraka yang dimakan oleh para pendosa?
question.ms: Apakah nama pokok di Neraka yang dimakan oleh para pendosa?

question.en: Which Sahabi was known as the 'Orator of the Prophet' (Khatib an-Nabi)?
question.tr: 'Peygamber'in Hatibi' olarak bilinen sahabe kimdir?
question.id: Sahabat mana yang dikenal sebagai 'Orator Nabi' (Khatib an-Nabi)?
question.ms: Sahabat mana yang dikenali sebagai 'Khatib Nabi' (Khatib an-Nabi)?

question.en: How many rakats are in the Witr prayer?
question.tr: Vitir namazı kaç rekattır?
question.id: Berapa rakaat salat Witir?
question.ms: Berapa rakaat solat Witir?

question.en: Who was the 'Master of the Martyrs' (Sayyid al-Shuhada)?
question.tr: 'Şehitlerin Efendisi' (Seyyidü'ş Şüheda) kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah 'Penghulu Para Syuhada' (Sayyidusy Syuhada)?
question.ms: Siapakah 'Penghulu Para Syuhada' (Sayyidusy Syuhada)?

question.en: Which Prophet was the first to write with a pen?
question.tr: Kalemle yazı yazan ilk peygamber kimdir?
question.id: Nabi mana yang pertama kali menulis dengan pena?
question.ms: Nabi mana yang pertama kali menulis dengan pena?

question.en: What is the name of the Prophet's flag?
question.tr: Peygamber Efendimiz'in (SAV) sancağının adı nedir?
question.id: Apa nama panji (bendera) Nabi (SAW)?
question.ms: Apakah nama panji (bendera) Nabi (SAW)?

question.en: Who killed Abu Jahl in the Battle of Badr?
question.tr: Bedir Savaşı'nda Ebu Cehil'i kimler öldürmüştür?
question.id: Siapakah yang membunuh Abu Jahal dalam Perang Badar?
question.ms: Siapakah yang membunuh Abu Jahal dalam Perang Badar?

answer.en: Muadh and Muawwidh (two young Ansari boys)

question.en: Which Surah ends with the names of two Prophets?
question.tr: Hangi sure iki peygamberin ismiyle biter?
question.id: Surah mana yang diakhiri dengan nama dua orang nabi?
question.ms: Surah mana yang diakhiri dengan nama dua orang nabi?

question.en: Who was the nursemaid who took care of the Prophet (SAW) after his mother died?
question.tr: Annesinin vefatından sonra Peygamberimizle (SAV) ilgilenen dadısı kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah pengasuh yang merawat Nabi (SAW) setelah ibunya wafat?
question.ms: Siapakah pengasuh yang menjaga Nabi (SAW) selepas ibunya wafat?

question.en: Which year is known as the 'Year of Deputations' (Aam al-Wufud)?
question.tr: 'Elçiler Yılı' (Senetü'l Vüfud) olarak bilinen yıl hangisidir?
question.id: Tahun apa yang dikenal sebagai 'Tahun Utusan' (Amul Wufud)?
question.ms: Tahun apa yang dikenali sebagai 'Tahun Utusan' (Amul Wufud)?

question.en: Who was the youngest commander appointed by the Prophet (SAW)?
question.tr: Peygamber Efendimiz (SAV) tarafından atanan en genç komutan kimdir?
question.id: Siapakah panglima termuda yang ditunjuk oleh Nabi (SAW)?
question.ms: Siapakah panglima termuda yang dilantik oleh Nabi (SAW)?

question.en: Which Surah is called the 'Heart of the Quran'?
question.tr: Kuran'ın Kalbi hangi suredir?
question.id: Surah mana yang disebut 'Jantung Al-Quran'?
question.ms: Surah mana yang dipanggil 'Jantung Al-Quran'?

question.en: What is the name of the mountain where Noah's Ark rested?
question.tr: Nuh'un Gemisi'nin oturduğu dağın adı nedir?
question.id: Apa nama gunung tempat bahtera Nuh berlabuh?
question.ms: Apakah nama gunung tempat bahtera Nuh berlabuh?

question.en: What was the inscription on the seal ring of the Prophet (SAW)?
question.tr: Peygamber Efendimiz'in (SAV) mühür yüzüğünde ne yazıyordu?
question.id: Apa tulisan yang terukir pada cincin stempel Nabi (SAW)?
question.ms: Apakah tulisan yang terukir pada cincin cap Nabi (SAW)?
